DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study evaluate pharmacokinetics ( PK ) Dapagliflozin pediatric subject type 2 diabetes mellitus ( T2DM )
DOC.brief_title: PK Study Dapagliflozin Pediatric Subjects With T2DM
DOC.detailed_description: Primary purpose : The primary purpose ass pharmacokinetics single dose Dapagliflozin range 2.5 10 mg pediatric subject age 10 17 year T2DM
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis T2DM Male female subject age 1017 Glycosylated Hemoglobin A1c ( HbA1c ) > 6 < 10 % Fasting plasma glucose ( FPG ) > 240 mg/dL screen Abnormal renal function Active liver disease and/or significant abnormal liver function
